name: Jouster 3
overview: A version of Joust for the Amiga, except with many more computer generated opponents to spar against. Based on the famous ostrich-riding game from Midway this game also has the player riding a flying ostrich and battling knights on similar steeds. Using keyboard controls the player must continually tap the spacebar to gain and maintain height while the arrow keys control direction. The game can play in differently sized game areas, animated background, power ups, and sound effects.
